desc: High-tech (easy to use), forward thinking, considerate hotel. Big and generous breakfast options, gym, pool, very cool rooms with Japanese-style compact living, with great prices to complement this, with some hidden surprises in your room!! Don't hesitate - book here and just spend your time booking the other things you wish to do in Singapore!!

title: Accessible and Affordable Hotel in the Middle of Orchard
desc: What I loved most about this hotel was the location. It is very accessible by both MRT and the bus. The room was small, though, but it was clean and well-maintained. I availed the of breakfast. Although the food tasted great, the selection was few and was barely changed during our 6-day stay. Nevertheless, we still had an excellent experience - speedy check-in and out.

title: Great hotel in a great location
desc: Loved my stay at the Yotel. The room, although small was clean and comfortable. There was a place in the room for everything. The view was fabulous and the location was very convenient. The staff were friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay there again.

title: Great experience
desc: Had a great experience with my family. Room was great, ac was great so as wifi and the room was perfect for our family. The hotel is easy to find and the team were all friendly and helpful. Komyunity restaurant was also great. Great food and drinks. Will recommend and hopefully will come back again

title: Very good experience
desc: Cabin very clean, team very pro. Emplacement at the center of the city in a really nice place of the city. Was a really good experience. Thank for this. If i came back one day in singapoor, il will probably come here again.

title: Yotel Stay
desc: overall pretty good and a new property so most things were quite new and in a good location with a fairly good selection of tasty food at breakfast - the rooms were quite small though and the washbasin is in the room but otherwise ok

title: Clean comfortable and small
desc: Check in is all automated and was efficient, staff on a reception will sort out any issues, or you can get the robot to bring your water to the room :) The rooms are very small and not much storage and not enough plugs, the bed slides up and down to give you more space during the day. The restaurant is nice and the breakfast was good, we only ate there once. There is an outdoor pool running down the side of the restaurant that looked lovely but we never used it. The hotel is near the top of Orchard road and the bus stops just outside the hotel and the subway is not far and there are a few shops for supplies near buy. If shops are your thing its in a great area. We were out most of the time as we only had 3 days in Singapore so time in the hotel was limited but is was

title: Worst experience ever‚Ä¶will never rebook or recommend to anyone
desc: The location is excellent coz u step out of the hotel and ur right in the middle of Orchard road bang opposite to the fist Starbucks of Singapore‚Ä¶but the rooms are pathetically small nearly any space to walk, the only window in the room is in the bathroom, the washbasin is inside the room eight next to the bed which is yuck‚Ä¶no storage space at all I mean literally not even any space to keep your laptop and work coz there are no tables or Chairs‚Ä¶rooms are so chlostribhobic that you don‚Äôt even feel like staying inside the hotel other than for sleeping only‚Ä¶if you are just looking for a place to crash for 1 night and have no other place then take your change here otherwise there are many other better and bigger places than Yotel Singapore orchard road

title: Not value for money
desc: Not value for money, room was so small, no daily cleaning (we stayed 4 nights but only cleaning 1 day) bed quility was so poor, both mattress and pillow are too soft, we paid hotel charges but in return with Airbnb services, poor

title: Good price and location
desc: Great hotel for what it is. Cheap and modern and well equipped. Pool is nice and a good place to swim and relax. We did the breakfast option and it was a great selection with something to eat no matter what your mood. The rain showers are a great addition to the rooms. Love the fact the shower has a view.

title: Cool hotel in Orchard
desc: The hotel is located in along Orchard Road which is within the Singapore CBD. Excellent location for shopping and food tripping. The bed is very comfortable, and the service is excellent. It was cool receiving room delivery from one of the hotel robots! The only downside is that the room is quite small but is manageable. Overall excellent experience, Thank you Yotel!

title: Very compact but what you need
desc: An extremely compact, but well designed room. Do not expect to spend a lot of time in the hotel room other than for sleep, unless you are on a very romantic holiday. Hotel has a futuristic and space theme which is quite nice. Very good location at Orchard Road. Have stayed here before and will probably come again - at least if I can get somewhat better rates than I managed this time on short notice.

title: If you want a toilet with a view, look no further
desc: My queen room with city view had no windows. Or so I thought. Then I walked into the bathroom and the whole side of the bathroom is clear glass to the entire outside world. Talk about zero privacy while on the toilet or in the shower. You can close the screens but then your entire room is in darkness with no external daylight

title: Modern Hotel
desc: Great location close to Orchard MRT station and shopping malls. The staffs were helpful and friendly. The soundproofing between room and exteriors were great. Bed was a little too soft. The room is quite small, I would suggest not to bring a lot of luggage (based on my own experience).

title: A memorable stay!
desc: A memorable stay and Great Service! Thank you! Will recommend to my colleagues! Special thanks to Miss Grace Leow for all the help that made my booking go so smoothly. Really appreciate it! will surely come again.

title: Center of comfort
desc: Love the location but it was a bit hard to find from walking at first. Once found, the hidden entrance is not an issue. Very friendly and helpful staff. Easy self check-in/out system. I'll stay here again definitely on my next trip.

title: Good location, everything is amazing but need to ensure that you‚Äôre full support
desc: Good location, everything is amazing but need to ensure that you‚Äôre full supported. As I feel disappointed in this time. It may my fault to inform staff upon check-in but normally every bookings input all details. It must show upon check-in.

title: Amazing!!
desc: Amazing hotel location is Perfect . The robot are amazing and the hotel staff !!!!!!!! It is 100 m away from orchid road. The shopping mall are close by . The mrt is close . The are load of park next to the hotel !

title: Excellent located but too expensive for Standard Attitude
desc: We've stayed there before due to excellent location at Orchard and just 100m to MRT. Still prices have doubled close to 5* levels while services & procedures are further standardized. Timing and process efficiency seems more important than guest satisfaction and warm atmosphere. Very tiny but efficient rooms with a real good bed (but small queen sized!). Glad that breakfast was not digital! ;-)

title: Great location, could have been better!
desc: The hotel location si great and the hotel interior is very modern and high tech. The only problem is the drain in restroom and the room is quite small for the price. The folding bed is okay but it makes the mattress too soft and uncomfortable for the sleep. Overall experience is amazing. The self check in and check out is swift and hassle free.

title: Modern hotel only for young people or not business related
desc: Hotel located in one of the best area with access to the shopping malls and restaurants. Room too small, with no desk, no wardrobe, no table where putting things. Being small in the room was difficult to control the temperature, too cold or too warm. Poor breakfast . People were not so friendly, you need to do everything check in and check out by yourself. It is worth to go for young people with limited budget. Absolutely to avoid for a business trip.

title: Yotel Orchard Business Stay
desc: The cost is higher than the room size and limited food variety during breakfast. But the room is clean. Strategic location at Orchad is very convinient to stay for business or vacation trip. For laundry need to put deposit.

title: Excellent hotel, Nice place
desc: The Hotel in nice location , Parking is available , Good services. Food and drinks are good, Size of room is somewhat smaller than I expected . Located in the Orchard street which is main road to many places, just next to Orchard Mall in which different shops & restaurant

title: Clean and good service
desc: Overall near shoppping mall and nearby mrt restaurants bar too friendly people meet new friends from tourists will go again next year like cool weather October and November same hotel orchard Rd easy to access

title: If you need a one night rest in Orchard, it will serve its purpose
desc: Does not go above expectation. Towel had patchy black spots, bed is too soft. Room electricity functions on motion sensors. So if you sleep like a dead log (me) be prepared to wake up at least twice in shock from the room‚Äôs heat. It‚Äôs pretty but don‚Äôt bother staying here for more than a night. your back will cry. They don‚Äôt allow extensions, even though the promised the day before so ya.

title: My stay at Yotel
desc: While the room size may not be like your usual hotel room, the location and convenience makes up for it. It is near public transport, shopping malls and even 24 hour eateries. Beds are very comfortable and are adjustable like orthopaedic ones.

title: Average experience
desc: The hotel itself looks new and cool. The breakfast is ok. My friends said the bed was too soft for them but it was fine for me. Love the fact that nice shampoo and lotion were provided. Some little flies in my room and shower didn't work well so the water was either too hot or too cold. Other than that I would say my stay was ok.

title: Perfect location, small room
desc: Location was perfect, right smack in the middle of action, yet tucked behind the noise from the main street. Check in was not smooth. The room was not ready at 3pm, so there was a bit of a wait at the lobby that had limited rest area. If you are not in a hurry, I think this won‚Äôt be a problem. So you will just need to moderate your expectations. Welcome Drink was only from 130pm onwards, take note. When I asked on check in day at 4pm, I wasn‚Äôt told about the timing and had intended to take the WD at 11am upon check out, and hence was offered soft drinks or coffee instead. Not a big problem, since it was free of charge, but just to take note. The room had a nice vibe, I really like the look of it and the bunk bed on top was a lot of fun. However, take note that the room is

title: Yotel Stay
desc: It is a hip hotel, cool concept. The service is good as well, the staff are helpful and polite. The location is also near the shopping area in Orchard Rd. I stayed for several days, would recommend having more variations on food for breakfast, other than that I'm happy with my stay.

title: Great for one person
desc: Great location, clean and comfortable, very helpful staff that even corrected the bill of their own accord when they noticed they had charged too much. Breakfast was rather underwhelming, so chose to have it on the go. Room is perfect for 1 person, a bit crowded for 2 and impossible if you have a lot of luggage.

title: Modern, clean and central
desc: Located on Orchard Road not far from the MRT, Yotel is well located for tourists wanting to explore Singapore. Check-in was quick and done via a computer in the hotel lobby. The room, like many in Singapore, is small and rather cramped - however it's very tidy and has a range of amenities. We had an overall comfortable stay here.

title: Comfortable experiences
desc: Reasonable prices with interesting bed! Overall, the experience is good as the location is near shopping mall, MRT and also a lot of restaurants near the hotel. The interesting part is I can adjust the bed according to the position I want while watching TV!

title: Clean, Modern, and Perfect Location
desc: We chose Yotel because of its price for its location. I was really looking for a place in Orchard for the convenience or my young daughter. I love that it is close to the MRT and bus stations. It was very easy to go around SG. I am very happy that it is also very clean. White bedsheets, clean bathroom and floors, even the mirrors were squeaky clean. The modern rooms and service robots are the cherries on top.

title: Good location, well-equipped small room
desc: The hotel is located in the city center, so getting anywhere is quite convenient. Opposite the road is a string of high-class malls, perfect for anyone who wants to shop. The only two downsides of the hotel are the size of the room (but understandable since this is Singapore) and the quality of the bed, which is too soft for me. Other than that, anything else about the hotel is good.

title: Best value hotel at unbeatable location
desc: Everything is superb here (location, staff, amenities). Rooms are of smaller size but the space is very well utilized. Fast and reliable WiFi connectivity. Just avoid the breakfast if not included with the room. Service is great but the food selection is just underwhelming.

title: Fantastic Stay!
desc: This was an awesome stay.. Superfast check-in,smart use of space, smart bed, awesome views and decent breakfast. As family of 3, I was concerned about the space in the room, but all the space constraints never once crossed my mind, after we had checked in. Super stay.. Loved it.

title: Compact rooms but great location
desc: Stayed for 3 nights on holiday with extended family in four separate rooms. Yes the rooms are tiny and they don't fit large luggage but they were clean. It's fine for 1 person, tight for a couple, too crowded for 3 adults. Considering the space, rooms were well laid out with a drop-down desk (more like the size of a shelf), hooks, wall-mounted reading lights. The sink is very close to the bed & there's only one bedside table with mini-fridge & electric kettle. Bed and bedding were very comfortable. The toilet is in the shower area - it's comparable to having a wet room (the floor does get slippery - be careful). Hotel location is ideal - primary shopping district and easy access to MRT. Rooms are serviced every 3 days (so for our 3-night stay, they were serviced on the day

title: Great time at great hotel
desc: it was a nice experience stay at yotel orchard, surrounding by so many mall but the price little bit expensive for me and the bed was not really comfortable for my back idk why but overall was great , I will tell to friend of mine about this place

title: Good location around Orchards rd
desc: good and clean hotel around orchards rd, easy access location, room/pad bit small, we took the triple room, water bottle is free at all times, clean towel can ask everyday to change, has iron and table, has hair dryer, umbrella.

title: The Best in Orchard Road
desc: Awesome Experience staying for the 5th time here üíñüíñ Check in & out was a breeze & fuss-free. All staff was friendly & helpful with a smile. It was my 2 Grandsons 2nd experience here, they even told me to stay longer on our next staycay in Singapore trip. We got a room with view of Ion Orchard and it's surrounding buildings know 29th floor, its Spectacular.

title: Comfortable staycation for family
desc: Great location at Singapore's shopping belt Orchard Road. Friendly and helpful staff. Cosy rooms to stay for a family of five. Response to room make-up was prompt. Replenishment of amenity items was regular.

title: Convenient Location and Good Price
desc: Worth the money and very convenient location. Staff are very efficient and respectful. Hotel room is clean and well kept. I would stay in this hotel again in the future. Location is very close to Orchard Road .

title: Small Humite rooms
desc: The rooms are nice and smart designed. However I selected the room based on the pictures online but in reality the rooms are much smaller then expected. Also the shower is next to your bed and no window can be opened which makes the room very humite. Your bed and clothes are getting very humite which is very uncomfortable. The next hotel I needed to unpack my luggage to dry the my clothes!! The hotel bar close very early around 10.00PM and as the rooms are small you do not really have a place to relax a bit after you come back from a meeting other than sitting on your bed and get a drink from the machine. Check in/out goes by self service which does not work properly so there are 2/3 person walking around to assist. Why not place these people behind the counter and make the

title: 17th December
desc: I enjoyed the hotel stay even though it was a short stay of one night but i really like the ambience of the place and it is good for the millennials and Gen Z guests who want to enjoy their time in Singapore without the stress of their household.

title: Poor value for money
desc: Stayed in Yotel SG for 1 night on 09 Dec 2022. Great location. Smart use of tech for check in and check out, beating the silly time taken by legacy hotels. Dislikes: - room is way too small for the price point. Hardly any space for luggage - toilet is equally tiny. - hand bidet has no water pressure. Serves no purpose - having wash basin in sleeping area is bad idea - toilet floor is very slippery. Accident waiting to happen - not sure why playing loud disco music outside the hotel. Irritating. Summary: poor value for money.

title: Convenient, easily accessible to MRT, shopping malls & eatery
desc: Very good in location, staff are very efficient, helpful and friendly. Special thanks to Conrad, Melissa & Otten for being very helpful. I was very impressed to their speedy services for feed back. When the Security Safe was not working well, they immediately get the Technician to change. Even when the air-conditioner was not that cold, they immediately send their technician to rectify the problem. All staff are Very Efficient and we are Very Very pleased to their Speedy Service and Rectification.

title: Misleading room size and horrifying comfort and space
desc: This place was very misleading compared to the pictures. A room of thet price was not meant for 3 people even though they said it was for 3. There is no space to even move! Bathroom had no partition so it was all wet. Badly designed

title: Great!
desc: Awesome tiny room with everything u need with efficient space use. Swimming pool was clean and fresh! Location is not exactly in the centre of the city but still within walking distance. Friendly staff and helpful!

title: Good Hotel with Great Location
desc: Great hotel at Great location. Since we are going to Singapore for shopping, this place is perfect for us as it is on the Orchard road. There are coffee shops and food court near by. MRT is also near so we take MRT wherever we go. Rooms are small but very clean. I stayed at room for 3 guests, 1 large bed for 2 guest and 1 upper bed. So my friend who is sleeping upper bed is not very convenient. Other than that, everything was fine. There is a pool but I didn't have a chance to swim as I was busy.

title: Singapore 4-11/Dec
desc: Good location for food and shopping access . Room too tiny for comfort, no chairs or sofa to sit . Bed mattress too soft, poor support in sleeping position . Not friendly a hotel for late check out . Need to nego

title: Price room rate not qualification enough
desc: Bed make pain back must changed. Room rate is expensive if compared with 4 or 5 star hotel. Staff not enough and all is safe help. Breakfast room not enough space and floor easy to who walk is sliding and fall down

title: compact but functional hotel
desc: clean and comfortable bed, small room good enough for 1 person, if sleep two , it might be tight. good locations hotel, at the area of orchard road, surrounded by eateries, shopping mall and walking distance to orchard MRT station , i will recommend to someone who like to have a short stay for day or two.

title: Good value for money
desc: Location is good and convenient. Just few minutes from Orchard Road. Check in and out process is very smooth. The one con is there is extra charges for early check in. Overall is good given the location of the hotel.

title: excellent hotel on orchard road
desc: Great location, service and facilities. Always a good choice due to its convenience and value for money. Within walking proximity to Orchard MRT, and there is no worry when it's pouring cos its sheltered all the way!

title: Excellent location
desc: The room was smaller than we imagined and the bathroom has frosted walls only therefore it wasn't very private if you shared, otherwise everything else was fabulous. Loved the bed as it was automatic and comfortable

title: Great choice on Orchard
desc: I had a 4-night stay here. Staff was courteous and friendly and requests for towels and amenities were promotply attended. First I thought hallway noise would be a concern, but eventually it died down and didn't bother my sleep at all. Great location, but the pool may use more lightning after sunset. Overall it was a great stay. Will return soon.

title: Overall great!
desc: First of all the location is perfect. It walking distance from Starbucks, drug store, convenience store, shopping malls, underground shopping area, food court, and eatery. The room itself is perfect for solo or couple traveler, not really recommended for 3 or more for single room or family traveling with babies and baby trollies. It‚Äôs location I‚Äôm Orchard Rd. very near luxury shopping mall but also other malls. There‚Äôs a MRT walking distance. I really enjoyed my stay as a solo traveler. The staff was really helpful. There‚Äôs a gym and breakfast p;us other Amenities.

title: elevator need to check
desc: The elevator stopped on the 23rd floor for one night, and the bell rang all night. In addition, the bathroom is easy to slip and fall when taking a shower, and the toilet paper is also easy to be sprayed with water.

title: Very Good
desc: All services in the hotel are very good. If there's something a little missing, It was room size very small. In addition, there were no small shower towels, and there were only 2 bottles of water at the home bar, which was rare for service products that required payment. The hotel's entire kiosk and check-in/out system were simple, and the staff were so kind. I plan to visit again next time.

title: Hotel getting old; better value elsewhere
desc: Stayed for a week in a triple room. Floor space very limited to I unpacked our suitcase and left the suitcase with reception as there was literally nowhere to put it in the room. 1 adult with 2 kids; I would have struggled to stay there with 2 adults due to very small room and lack of storage space (wardrobe etc). Everything showing signs of age; mouldy silicone seals, cupboards don't really open and close properly, window blinds semi broken etc. Bed VERY uncomfortable. Didn't sleep properly all week. View from room was nice (level 28). Staff nice although not always knowledgeable. Good location to catch buses. Little bit of a walk to orchard station if you have kids. Convenient to isetan food and ion food.

title: My First Yotel Experience
desc: This is a great experience. The hotel is sitting at convenient location, easy to access MRT station. And the cleanliness is awesome. Fair price, and they even offered me two free cocktails vouchers during my stay. I will definitely stay in this hotel again.

title: Super clean & comfy room
desc: Excellent location within short walking proximity to shopping, dining & entertainment venues. Immaculately clean rooms serviced daily and ample supply of complimentary private labeled bottled water..Staff was super friendly & helpful contributing to the unique vibe of the hotel. Highly recommend and would book again. Perfect for tbose who love to get out & about and not spend their vacation in their room.

title: Recommended
desc: Love this hotel because of the service and cleanliness. It's not too far from Orchard MRT. Check in and check out very easy and fast. They have helpful staff who standby anytime if you need. Thank you Yotel Orchard!

title: Great Location for Price
desc: access to public transport - mrt, bus, taxi was excellent. Room was small and tight. Compact for sleep not for staying in and moving about. Essential Amenities provided. Good AC and hot water system. Convenient for visiting Orchard road area

title: Great Hotel, Great Price, Great Location
desc: This hotel is located at Orchard which is Singapore's famous area for those who would like to get easy access to shopping malls from local products to luxury brands. It is also quite close to the MRT station which has access to two lines (North-South Line and Thomson-East Line) where either both could either land you to Gardens by the Bay or Marina Bay Sands. A bus stop is also located right next to the hotel as well as a German restaurant that opens till late which has decent burgers for those who are looking to get some food late. 7-Eleven and Cheers convenience stores are also nearby. The room itself is quite small but from what I know that's how most hotel rooms would be like in Singapore when you pay at this price but I would say that the room in Yotel is better than most.

title: OK
desc: Hotel ok but the rooms are very very small .The smell of the corridors are very bad . Breakfast service wasn‚Äôt good , food not fresh , price hogh just location ok . I would not recommend for family or friends.

title: Nice Place To Stay
desc: The location was perfect; it was near a very nice area, malls, and restaurants that were all within walking distance. The design was extremely nice and contemporary. The room was immaculately clean, and the bed was extremely comfortable, right down to the pillows.

title: One of the best hotel to visit in Singapore
desc: Superb service and clean room. We also enjoyed our breakfast. Hope to stay there soon when we visit singapore again and we are excited to try other Yotel accomodations around the world. Thank you Yotel and team

title: Great Hotel in a good location
desc: I was curious about the Robots and the Smartbed. The Robots didnt disappoint. The Smarbed could be smarted up with some cool additional Features like "Memory the Couch Position". But non the less my stay was quite pleasant and relaxing!

title: A modern clean comfortable hotel
desc: We booked two rooms for 4 nights for 5 people in the family. Each room was very modern and clean. Aircon worked well. Room has a smart design. Beds were comfortable. Some reviews I read said the bed was too soft. I found the bed just right. My daughter thought it was slightly on the hard side with a soft foam on the top and hard mattress under the foam. I have a very weak lower back but I didn't get back pain sleeping for 4 nights. The only negative side is that the room is very small for 3 people, only one platform can put one suitcase on, other suitcases must stand up against the wall and must be put on the bed if want to open it. Room size for 2 people is ok.

title: Great for solo traveller
desc: The location is great. The breakfast has got its variety. However the room is small. Even if there is a balcony, there isn‚Äôt any furniture on the balcony. There isn‚Äôt cupboard for folded clothings. No writing desk and proper chair too.

title: Great location, provide all basic necessities
desc: Short distance and walkable to orchard road, bed was comfortable, basic necesities available (soap, shampoo, body lotion, etc).. Room bit too small though, and have to put on window shield most of the times, everytime using bathroom...

title: awsome
desc: easy to checkin near from orchard centre, easy to find mrt stastion, near from bua stop, amazing bed, cool hotel so modern, nice bath room, very recomended hotel for a couple , easy to chek out, have a robot to help you

title: My visit to Singapore
desc: It was our first visit to Singapore. We choose yotel due to its convenient location and nearby good commercial area to shop. The room size is too small which I don't like much. Adding small robots in the control team is nice initiative.

title: Excellent team and location
desc: Enjoy the stay. Good location. Easy access to bus and MRT if you are travelling throughout suburbs. And seeing the robots were pretty enjoyable including Yoshi. Wifi was really adequate compared amongst other services. Staff were very helpful and kind. If I came back I would stay there üíØ thanks for making this stay YOTEL comfortable...

title: Cool hotel in the heart of Singapore
desc: Room a bit small but it is expected from Yotel brand. Cool hotel, comfy bed, really good and friendly service from check in and breakfast. Great selection of breakfast, egg station, non stop clearing plates, quick and efficient. Bfast staff make sure no dirty empty plates on your table. Clean bathroom and bed sheets, felt and smell like fresh linen every day unlike some other hotels I have stayed. Will stay here next time visiting Singapore

title: PHF
desc: All we need for a good value. Good location Very quiet room A few remarks about the concept of the room. The design concept with the bathroom on the side of the facade reduces the impression of space in the room by filtering the view of the outside. So a little small for a couple with a real concern for the privacy of the bathroom toilets

title: Excellent
desc: it is clean, had quiet and comfortable stay, very accessible location, price is right too, love to come back the next time I am in the country, although the room is small but I love the cool designs inside and the themed purple color

title: pretty good!
desc: this is my second time staying at yotel. i traveled alone this trip so the size of the room is decent, would not recommend for families though. the rooms are not soundproof so you can hear activities in the hallway or nearby rooms pretty clearly if they are loud. overall great service and location. only a few minutes walk away from orchard mrt (ion exit) and a bunch of food everywhere. the Kalm salon in the intl building connected to the yotel elevator is very nice too! would return again

title: I shall return
desc: thank you for coming up with an affordable practical clean hotel. Location is ideal and the hotel provides convenience and accessibility to public transport. I have told all my friends about it. I am happy to have stayed in your hotel!

title: Best value hotel !
desc: Excellent location. It is located near MRT and Bus stations as well as Mall areas. Our room was very quiet and comfortable though a little cramped . Very clean hotel (Our rooms were cleaned daily) with helpful Staffs. The hotel robots were added plus points, and the breakfast was very good . Over all a highly Recommended Hotel in Singapore.

title: Highly recommended
desc: Overall stay was excellent. Bed was adjustable, maybe causing middle part to sink more, or maybe it was memory foam? (Which I didn't care for) but I still love it! Would definitely stay there again if I had the chance and more time time needed to discover Orchard Rd.

title: We didn‚Äôt feel like VIPs in the ‚ÄúVIP SUITE‚Äù
desc: So Yotel refers to this suite as being its ‚ÄúVIP Suite‚Äù, however it‚Äôs less than so. Staff at Yotel were superbly amazing from the front desk, phone operators and even the housekeeping team they were just A-listers. Thank you for making my stay so comfortable. The reason behind my rating was how they treated my request for ice which just left me disgusted. This wasn‚Äôt my first time in the suite, my first time was in 2021 and the excuse was Covid, to have us come down IN PERSON to collect ice from the restaurant in a plastic bag coz they claim to not have ice buckets. Guess what it‚Äôs 2023 and this time they just said no ice buckets and they had my friend carry empty cups of ice from the restaurant back to the room and this was the EFFING VIP SUITE???!!! It was such a turnoff.

title: A good base in Singapore
desc: Enjoyed my stay. The room was clean and functional. Very good transportation to all parts of Singapore (even a bus to and from Changi Airport). Location very good with abundance of eateries and malls (lots of malls!)

title: Comfortable bed
desc: Pros: Comfortable bed, decent gym, TV can be connected via HMDI, adjustment of bed allow me to do work comfortably, prompt service on weekday (request completed within 10 minutes), really close to the bus stop and Wheelock Place (with Starbucks, Shake Shack and connected to orchard linkway). Cons: Freezing pool (felt like someone dumped bucket of ice into it), slow service on weekend (request may take more than 30 minutes to complete), not exactly close to the train station.

title: Cool hotel for short stay/sleep
desc: Cool hotel for short stay/sleep with small but ergonomic and modern rooms. Great view from the bath and unusual robots. If you need only to sleep and are not afraid of small spaces it will be the good value choi—Åe.

title: Nice Stay
desc: The room was so clean and comfortable, but the bed is too soft for me. :) best price hotel around the location. really enjoy our stay at this hotel. surely will comeback again to this hotel when we go to singapore next time.

title: Overpriced with no quality
desc: Had a long layover in Singapore with the transit hotels fully booked. Managed to get in at YOTEL who charge just as much as the transit hotels but only for a shoebox size room. Corridors leading to room are tired and dirty. Bed sheets were clean but in poor condition (see photo). Crazy price for what you get

title: Terrible Staff at Reception but property is good value for money
desc: Great location and well designed rooms such that while the rooms are small, they managed to fit everything in the room.Staff at Mission Control needs alot of training in terms of customer service, how to speak to people as well as appearance as they appear dishevelled most times.

title: Comforting Stay
desc: We enjoyed our stay at Yotel because the hotel was very clean, the bed was comforting and the location is perfect.. We can walk to ion orchard and take MRT to other places.. The room rate is also not so expensive..

title: Cool
desc: Loved the overall vibe of the hotel and the futuristic appeal. Staff were friendly. Check-in and check-out experience was great. Great location, right on the Orchard road. Gym and pool were awesome too!

title: Good Stay!
desc: The hotel is centrally located with covered walk to MRT and most of shopping centers. The check in with the machine was smooth and no hussles. The room was nice and as expected it is small due to SG Standard but has full amentities as most hotel have.

title: Great location, with an amazing view from the room
desc: Great location near Orchard intersection, amazing view from the room (we booked a room with a view on the 25th out of 30 floors), it might seem like a small room but it was greatly organised and it had a nice electric bed.

title: Great hotel in a super location and reasonably priced
desc: Loved the convenienient location and that it was reasonably priced. The staff were friendly and helpful. The room was small but clean and well appointed. Easy to catch a taxi at the hotel as passengers were always being dropped off.

title: A convenient place when staying Singapore
desc: Yotel Orchard Rd is a newfangled and convenient place for staying in Singapore. The room is a little bit small with that price, but the functions are sufficient. The sound insulation is good. I‚Äôll definitely choose Yotel again, even travelling other cities.

title: Yotel SG
desc: I think this is the best hotel for solo travelling like me in Singapore, this hotel is so clean and futuristic like japan hotel. We also can adjust the bed position to make us comfortable to sleep. All staffs are friendly Thank you for the hospitality!

title: Recommended hotel
desc: Good location at orcard road, near bus stop and mrt orchard, room cleanliness except the bathroom little bit smelly, easy to find drugstore and foodstore., behind isetan Orchard, helpfull staff. But still recommended to stay again

title: Excellent in everything except size of room
desc: Despite the very small room, everything was excellent here. Breakfast was extensive and amazing quality. Happy hour drinks were great, room was super clean and well maintained. Robot came with requested towels (towels and water are the extent of items). Location was really close to bus stops, metro and swanky shopping.

title: Not for Us
desc: The hotel is in a great location near the corner of Orchard and Scotts Roads with covered access to the MRT and many shopping centres on Orchard Road. Unfortunately, they have an early check out and late check in times. We arrived in the morning and could pay $S190 for an early check in or $S60 after noon. Our hotel on a previous visit in Chinatown, Singapore gave us a noon check without charge. The hotel has self-check in, very few people could check in without assistance. You would not describe the staff as service orientated. Not once were we given any greeting or acknowledgement, they just waited for your question and got rid of you as quickly as they could. The room was very modern, very clean but very small. There was only enough room to walk around the bed with no

title: Front Desk Requires Professional Training
desc: Hotel is at Great Location But staff are very LACK of Professional Hotel Management Training. Can‚Äôt handle Guests Complaints instead created more Frustration. Won‚Äôt be Back as it doesn‚Äôt feel welcoming

title: Yotel in Orchard
desc: Perfect location as it was in Orchard road. It was near a bus stop and mrt, Room was clean and buffet breakfast was good. I like how the bed was adjustable and really comfortable. Hotel staff were friendly and accomodating.

title: Excellent
desc: Room is congested compared to rate. Rate was very high , may be due to my last moment booking/very important business area. But cleanliness, service, was excellent. Check in process was very smooth and time saving

title: Best hotel in SG with reasonable price
desc: Hotel is clean and very conveniently located. access to literally everywhere due to many malls and MRT. most importantly, staffs are really the ones that made my trip so wonderful and comfortable. you will not regret this. (i never write review but this is really the first time because i want to recommend to many people)

title: Overnight stay
desc: The location is great for shoppers, check in and out was super easy and convenient. Friendly staff ready to assist with any questions. Not much room to move around, probably good for up to 2 days stay. Did not get to check out the restaurants or pool as it was a short stay.

title: feel good fr the looby till room, clear signage
desc: i like the most, strategic location , nearby to china town, can be easily access to all the shopping centre , further to that is , mrt station nearby , so easy for the connectivity , my children like it too .

title: Great value for money
desc: One of the most affordable hotels in singapore. very convenient and close to the mrt station, very clean, fantastic room service and easy to check in and out. Everything needed was in such a small room very cleverly designed to fit everything.

title: Really great overall
desc: I think that this hotel is great overall. It has always been my go to hotel if I go to Singapore as it is located in the center of the city and its convenient to find things around. Would definitely recommend!

title: Loved my stay!
desc: The location of the hotel is excellent, on Orchard Road with the MRT station and bus stop close by, not to mention shopping malls in the area. The room is small but very efficiently planned, with table tops that slide in or up to maximize space. The bed reclines and is perfect for TV watching or reading. You can hook up your device to the TV, however, know that iphones do not pair well via Bluetooth, and you will need an HDMI cable and adapter (limited quantity at the hotel). The toilet/shower room is not separated by a curtain, so when you shower, the floor on the toilet side could get wet. Also, make sure the blinds are down when you are "doing your business"!

title: Yotel Singapore 7 nights, 8 Days
desc: Perfect Hotel especially for those travelling on a budget! The room was very nice, albeit a bit small. Bathroom was wonderful, and the breakfast was also very good. Gym and pool have nice ambiance, and robots were very cute. Staff were very friendly, helpful, and attentive.

title: Good location
desc: Good location. Small room and slippery bathroom. Machine check in check out doesnt work properly. Take to long to check in and check out. No waiting room and not enough chairs in the llobby. We have to stand while one of us waiting dor check in of check out

title: Worth the stay
desc: The hotel is really close to the MRT system, only 5 min walking. Walk across the street and you'll find all the utilities you need (convenient stores, restaurants, spas, shopping malls, etc.). The staff is so friendly and helpful. My family did enjoy the stay here.

title: Perfect location in Orchard
desc: The hotel locate near the bus stop to the airport, it is very convenient. I book the room with the city view, overall is good as recommended by my friend. I love the robot, it is very cute and smart! The staff are friendly and helpful.

title: Highly recommend
desc: Staff, cleanliness and rooms were first class. Rooms were not very good to work in (too small and no desk set up) and whilst food was good, selection could have been better with some more healthy options. Overall experience was very good and will happily stay there again.

title: Exellent
desc: We stayed for 2 nights . Location is good. Staff is very polite and helpful . Room was a bit small but very elegant. Breakfast has lots of choices as well. Overall it was a great experience . We will recommend to our friend as well.

title: Great stay!
desc: It was a very good stay every single time i had a booking. Comfy beds, great location, had a couple of drinks at the bar, the staff are very great in their service. Would definitely stay again as this is one of my favourite options.

title: Nice hotel in strategic location
desc: This is the first time we try Yotel Hotel, but my friend told me that the hotel is nice and clean eventhough the room is small. However, the location is strategic near famous mall that we know. Thank you

title: Highly recommend
desc: Yotel Orchard has a good location, you are easily go to anywhere from Yotel. Also I received a birthday surprise from hotel, it was really nice. Highly recommend Yotel Orchard to you, plus the price is also reasonable too.

title: room
desc: it was to small for value for money its still expensive for the room. the staff is very accommodating they so helpful.everything is good except for the room.the robot yolanda is so cool i wish i can bring it to my place

title: Good. Modern, neat and compact rooms. Not your standard hotel.
desc: The location of this is spot on Near to the junction of Orchard Road and Scotts Road and Orchard MRT. Rooms are compact, neat and functional. However if you want space and a big room look elsewhere. The views out of the rooms were pretty good. Yoshi and Yolanda are the two service bots. Generally this is a good hotel but not your classic hotel if that is what you are after.

title: Wonderful
desc: Small room but you don't need more to stay , super nice, modern design, Perfect location, is near to very nice area, malls, restaurants, at walking distance. Super clean and the bed was amazing, super comfortable including the pillows, you can really rest overnight, the staff is super friendly and very helpful. I really recommend this property for business, couples and small families. I stayed there 6 nights

title: Great Hotel In Good Location
desc: Very good hotel in Orchard area. Near MRT or Bus station. Unique bed room with modern technologies. Check in process was very fast and efficient. And the best is the view from the bathroom. You can see Singapore skyscraper while take a shower.

title: TIPP
desc: Good location easy to walk and reach many shopping malls in Orchard road eg. ION, Takashimaya, Paragon, TANG, etc. Room is clean and convenience. Check in & Check out process very fast (less than 5 mins). Staffs are friendly and professional.

title: Great stay at this hotel
desc: We just have nice words to describe our stay in the hotel. The experience was way beyond what we have expected. The rooms are always clean and fresh. The bed and pillows are great that made our sleep well. Wifi was fast and easy to connect to. Great selection of channels on thier TV. They even have foreign channels to our surprise. Housekeeping service was superb. The view from the washroom/shower is to die for. Will for sure book again and will recommend to others.

title: A cool hotel
desc: I stayed in Yotel for four days. And when we first got there, I have to say that I never thought about the main entrance would located in a small alley. And the service was absolutely great, especially the service counter. And what made me really impressed was there BREAKFAST, I have to say that was awesome, so delicious and so many choices.

title: Trendy and fun in a great location
desc: I would love to give 5 stars but 5 stars is ultra lusxurious. This hotel is trendy, modern and fun. Especially when extra bottles of water are delivered for free by a robot. Small rooms but there is a place for everything. Very centrally located too. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The view from the loo is fantastic!

title: Confine but comfortable & convenient
desc: Great & convenient location which is Orchard MRT just nearby. Room is tiny. Price rather high even with breakfast provided but clean and comfortable. Small gym facilities provided. Staffs all are super helpful & friendly. Use their self check-in & check-out kiosk which are found is more faster

title: Stay at Yotel Singapore
desc: The stay was pleasant, the room was cleaned daily, and because in Singapore the humid rate is high, the sheets were changed daily. We selected a room with a city view, and it was worth it. The breakfast is good, plenty of options to choose from, there is also a chef that makes omelets at your request, and your choice of ingredients. As for the location, it is near an MRT train station, and has 4 malls nearby, With lots of shops or a great food court. If you plan to stay in the shopping district, it is a good choice.

title: Yes, Yotel
desc: Very convenient location (near MRT and big shopping road in SIngapore), small but efficient rooms, fun robots, nice pool area, comfortable beds, cool city views (if you chose that type of room), clean bathrooms and showers, friendly staff who were able to call us taxicabs. Nothing to complain about!

title: YO - LOVELY HOTEL!!!
desc: The hotel was very modern from checking In/Out to the Room, I like the room but maybe a tiny bit smaller that I've expected, Love the location - convenient to get to the MRT station and Shopping Centers, the staff were super helpful, love the spread of the food for Breakfast - will definitely stay here again for my next business trip!

title: Tripple room
desc: 3 persons can stay in one room ( King or Queen size bed + 2nd floor extra bed ). Breakfast is quite good and I like the view, also. It's close to the bus stop and you can take the taxi with ease by hotel staff's' help.

title: good but limited options to do work at hotel
desc: Overall good experience, enjoyed breakfast variety, location was great. Near food and shopping Room cleanliness was good. No chair or proper desk in room, no sitting area in lobby, no work/meeting common space.

title: Small but clean
desc: Pretty small but you can find most things you need in the room. And its clean. Its slightly expensive given the size and the *luxury* of the room. That said its pretty good. The location is not bad as well although you may find it difficult grabbing a taxi without booking through the concierge.

title: Small but comfy enough
desc: Very comfortable bed. The room is small but every practical thing you need is provided to make your stay as comfy as possible. Reception staff are very helpful. The hotel is strategically situated in orchard rd. Breakfast was part of our booking, and it was excellent.

title: Best view ever from the bathroom, but ‚Ä¶
desc: Having small but well-appointed rooms is a good concept. My lasting impression of the room is of the bathroom. It takes up the entire window side of the room, with (untinted) glass from ceiling to floor. It‚Äôs the best view I‚Äôve ever had from a hotel bathroom. Unfortunately, blinds are needed when you use, so the best feature of the room is wasted.

title: Tiny rooms and flaw bathroom design
desc: The hotel had tiny rooms and the bathroom didn't had a door separating it from the toilet. The bed were not comfortable. The only good thing was the location which was close to the main Orchard Shopping areas.

title: Good location in the city center
desc: Good location and great access to the shopping malls in the city center and MRT. Good place for short stay, varieties of facilities such as gym and swimming pool. Friendly staffs and good breakfast quality

title: Great location
desc: Excellent location with everything you can eat and shop at your door stop. Very close to MRT and easily access paths. Clean hotel with great view of the city. The staff are friendly. The rooms are really quiet too. Would stay again.

title: Great rooms, good location and value
desc: Stayed in 3 bad cabin, small but well designed rooms. Didn‚Äôt have much luggage so worked well for us. Room to store under the bed though. Location is good too, although a little tricky to find from MRT.

title: Room too small.
desc: Room is too small, felt like claustrophobic. Over priced and yet had to pay much more than booking. Com price due to service charges and taxes. Price should include these in advertising, so misleading. Will not choose again.

title: The best value hotel in Orchard
desc: In November 2022 I posted a review about a negative experience at yotel orchard, I returned in March 2023 to give it another try and this time it has been fantastic. The service has been great, the views spectacular and the bed is the most comfortable hotel bed I've slept in. The location may seem a little hard to get to at first, but once you work it out, it is second to none in Singapore. Ion is a stones throw and from there the rest of the island is accessible by MRT. Are the rooms smaller than most on Orchard road? Yes. But, for the $ saving per night, you can spend your money at one of the many malls or restaurants that are so close. Plus after spending 10 minutes with the space saving ideas in the 'cabins' it won't seem as small as your first thoughts. Clearly the best

title: Highly recommended for all age groups
desc: The staff is super welcoming and friendly. The amenities are very good from the rooms, to the restaurant, lobby and gym. The location also enabled walking to shops and tourist destinations, as well as only small taxi rides to everywhere else around Singapore.

title: Good, but not perfect.
desc: Planned staycation as a relationship milestone celebration as well as a break from work. Check in was okay but initially had issues with the self check in and had no one around to help with and went to the counter for assistance. Front desk lady had a very displeasing tone and attitude when we told her self check in wasn‚Äôt working for us . Otherwise we had a good stay afterwards, housekeeping team did a splendid job maintaining the room throughout our stay and went out their way to arrange our skincare on the sink/mirror area nicely. However, maintenance wise; our door was slightly misaligned and had to use extra force to lock the safety locks and secondary lock and had a bit of leaky issues with the handheld shower. But no biggie, overall we loved and enjoyed this trip and we

title: Great Hotel
desc: Will definitely stay in this Hotel when i go to Singapore again. Location is convenient. Staffs are very helpful, friendly and honest. Room is clean and the bed is comfortable. The air-Cond and water heater are working fine. I enjoy staying in this hotel.

title: Small hotel in great location
desc: I booked this hotel because it‚Äôs the cheapest in Orchard road. Very good location, 2 mins walk to Orchard Rd. The room is very small, but I‚Äôm surprise to the facility they provide. In this very small room, they provide ironing board, umbrella, hair dryer, fridge and even safe deposit box. Even some of the furniture can be extended into a table. Suitable if you only traveling for 2 persons. The only thing I don‚Äôt like it‚Äôs the shower, no separator to the toilet so everything is wet. However the room is very clean. Will definitely come back.

title: Very convenient location
desc: Yotel is not your classic hotel but a convenient hub to explore the city, the malls and take the red-line or brown-line MRT from very close by, e.g. to get to Marina Bay, Gardens by the Bay or Chinatown. Spend more money and get a room higher up. Rooms are small bit quite modern including a Nespresso Coffee. Bed (very comfy) does fold to become shorter or longer so to create more space in the room :-) Breakfast is okay, not too many healthy options though (very small Asian food section) but great Capuccino machine! There‚Äòs a small pool next to the breakfast room and a small gym, too. Service ist fast but dob‚Äòt rely on the robots for deliveries (yes, robots), they are often out of work. Anyway, would come back because of the convenient location!

title: Modern hotel in Orchard
desc: Great location, walking distance to shopping center in Orchard. Close to Orchard MRT. The room looks modern and clean. However, it very small, and it is good if you only plan to sleep in room. Compact and minimalist.

title: Small but very
desc: I am the son of the person who booked this hotel and even if my dad said it was a bit small, I found it perfect as it had many features for quality living. The reason for the 4/5 stars on the value and rooms were how it was still small. The robots were also a nice touch for creativity and the soap, shampoo, conditioner and the lotion thing came in really cool bottles that were clean and beuatiful. I lost one of my rubber ducks around here so if you find one with Edwin written under it, please email this email, thank you. Amazing place

title: Excellent and secured location
desc: I will book this hotel again because of its proximity to train and malls. Located at the back of a commercial area but still very private as it is nearby the other residential buildings in the area. Small but well laid out. Good for couples or small groups.

title: Nice clean hotel in great location
desc: I highly recommend this hotel if you want a convenient place to stay because it is close to everything. Staff are friendly and the price is affordable. The room is not so big but clean and comfortable.

title: Excellent Experience
desc: Even I travel for a business purpose but the hotel serves more than that which I would say really cool. Every element in the hotel was very very well organized. Nothing I have experienced bad. Highly recommended for others to experience.

title: Great quality
desc: It‚Äôs a very nice hotel in a good place. We had a small, but comfortable room, which was staffed with everything what you need. There was also a beautiful view point from the room. Very friendly and helpful staff.

title: Saera Park
desc: YOTEL's condition was so clean and break fast was delicious and so nice, too. Especially I was able to eat fresh eggs as YOTEL's chef fried eggs and right after served that for me. It was very good to me. Thank you for making our travel enjoyable!

title: Amazing service at an amazing hotel!
desc: 100% Happy with this incredible experience! Completely exceeded my expectations. Room was clean, silent and perfectly air conditioned. View from the window was amazing and the entrance lobby looked like an amazing futuristic movie set. You MUST give this hotel a try. Will be going back ASAP!

title: Yotel
desc: Yotel stay was indeed a good one for me eventho size of room is pretty small but love the view from the toilet. Also, would be better if the TV is smart TV so can log in to my Netflix. Please look into this and if it's possible. Nevertheless, an amazing sexy stay for me!

title: Nice!
desc: Nice quirky place. Great for a few nights. Phenomenal location. Great vibe overall and super sleek albeit small room. Very comfortable overall and the atmosphere is very good. Service friendly and reasonable value for the money considering location

title: Very cool hotel!
desc: YOTEL Singapore is amazing! Self check-in was easy, if you had an issues or questions, staff were present to assist Plenty of elevators, never had to wait more than 2 minutes The room was small (expected), but suited our needs as a couple! Bed was comfy and adjustable from flat to siitting up. Theres a mini fridge, kettle, cups. Overall was very clean! Bathroom had a beautiful view, and the rain shower was wonderful. Water pressure was always good and water was hot when you wanted. Getting things ordered to you room, such as water or extra towels was very convenient (either by the robots or the hotel staff). We briefly visited the pool, looked nice, but nothing special. Didn't swim in it. The gym was average, not much there. 1 or 2 treadmills/ellipticals, some free weights

title: Small hotel but good location
desc: Its been second time stay at yotel each time visiting singapore. Location was great, easy to find shopping centre and food. Hard to locate for local taxi because pronounciation the same between hotel and yotel. Must show the name card or address. Front desk Service was great, give exactly what we request. Free water bottle is the best compliment service given from yotel. Room cleanliness questionable. Dont know how often room service change the bed sheet. I stay for 6 days and last 2 days feel itchy on the upper bed. No sign show whether they already sanitize or change the bed sheet, etc. some hotel put sticker label on the door if they sanitized or clean the room etc.

title: Clean & excellent service but room's very compact
desc: We stayed in a triple room. It had a double deck bed. A Queen sized bed at the bottom and a single one at the top. The room (they call it cabin) was very clean. Service was excellent. But the cabin is small. If you have big luggage, the space would be even more limited. But the hotel's in a strategic location. No regrets staying there.

title: Modern hotel with small rooms and bad breakfast!
desc: Yotel is a hotel with a modern concept, small but very clean rooms, but in the design they have make a big error with the bathroom, very slippery and dangerous for older people! The breakfast is quite bad if I compare hotels in the same price range. Advice better NOT INCLUDE a breakfast. But the most positive point is the location near Orchard Road and MRT.

title: Small room.
desc: Poorroom size for 3 people. Water pressure and water temperature temperamental. Requested late check out was granted 1 hour with poor service attitude. Great location dreadful hotel and staff service /attitude.

title: Very nice stay
desc: Although the room was small and deskless, the Yotel offers many advantages such as comfort, easy access, location, great service and very honnest staff. I had left my Montblanc pen in the safe and the Yotel immediately let me know it was in their safe hands and for me to collect anytime.

title: Very good hotel for stay
desc: Can walk trough basement to ion, tangs, wheelock place. Can eat at lucky plaza basement (cheap) or at foodrepublic shaw center basement level (next to isetan grocery). The bed is so comfort, even tough the bunker bed.

title: Louis
desc: Excellent location. Mission control staff also very helpful. House keeping lady was very nice and polite. The hotel is close to shopping train and bus service. Being centrally located. We had a eeally nice time

title: Good location, clean, but claustrophobic rooms, way over priced!
desc: The location of the hotel is excellent. It's modern and clean. However, the room is way too small, even if it was expected as its brand, I was still surprised by how tiny the room was. It was impossible to store anything, my clothes and stuff had to be left inside the luggage during my 3 nights stay. The wash basin is right next to the bed which is quite inconvenient. The bed had to be folded during the day, otherwise there's no room to walk pass. For such a tiny little room and the price they charge is astonishing. Way over-priced! -- Perhaps it's because of the location? -- I don't understand how they can claim 4-star for this kind of room. Service is non-existent. Stay here only if you are traveling solo for only 1 night and can't find anywhere else available. I

title: Not good for me
desc: This is a hotel with small rooms. The staff is ok, they will help you with your check in and check out but they can do better. On checkout, I tried using the computer and they told me to go to the front desk, upon going there everyone was busy and they kept pointing me to go see the other staff. The room is really small. The Washbasin is beside your bed which really bothers me. The 3rd person should sleep in the bunk bed on top so he/she has to climb a ladder. My nephew who just woke up fell from the ladder as he missed one step. Good thing nothing happened. I won't go back to this hotel, it is not for me. I stayed for 3 nights and am glad to be out. The community floor is on the 10th level. You can stay there but you cannot bring your own food. Another similar-class hotel

title: Very bad
desc: Room is very small, no doubt location wise is good, but the same amount of money, you are able to get another hotel with more space and quality. Service is bad, i willing to pay for my extensive check out time, let's say at 12pm, but was rejected, which is unacceptable as other hotel in Singapore do provide this service to guest

title: Great affordable experience
desc: This hotel was a good, relatively inexpensive, option for a quick stopover in Singapore. The location is great, in the Scotts/Orchard area, with great shopping, dining and entertainment nearby. Additionally, while the rooms are very small, they were clean, comfortable and well equipped with good wifi. The only negatives were that the check-in process was slow/over-complicated and there was some noise audible from the corridor when in the room. Overall, a decent experience for a quick stay.

title: Awesome stay at the best price
desc: Perfect location. Price is right. Super convenient with amenities downstairs in mall, food court, and supermarket. The gym can be bigger but decent enough. It is easy to get a taxi or subway from the hotel.

title: GOOD CLEAN HOTEL
desc: Helpful Staff, good service, strategically located in Orchard St., accessible to smrt and bus line, easy link to mall or smrt by underground passages. unique bathroom, glass walled, spacious, the bed are reclinable, smart room, fast wifi, usb all around, appliances ingeniously imbedded on the walls! GREAT PLACE TO REST after a long touring day.

title: Not as expected! pay attention to the room size when you do your booking
desc: The room is very small! I know it's my fault that I didn't pay attention to the size of the room when I booked through Booking.com, although as most people, I look at the pictures available on the app, but the reality is not as in the pictures. The hotel is clean, receptionists are very polite, location is great... but in conclusion, the room its not suitable for two friends, it is suitable for one adult only.

title: Awesome Hotel
desc: I‚Äôm going to be honest here, when I booked my room in Yotel Singapore on Orchard Rd I thought I was going to be staying in something slightly bigger than a capsule hotel. To my surprise I was totally wrong and found this to be one of the best value for money hotels in the Orchard Rd area. Room: perfect for me as I was on a business trip. Yes the room was small but it more than served the purpose of guarding my suitcase while I was at meetings. Modern design very clean room plenty on charging ports for my gadgets. Well designed room and storage space for my suitcase under the bed. Bathroom was very clean and had some great smelling soaps and shampoo. Location: Excellent. Close to MRT, supermarkets and restaurants Staff: friendly and helpful. Value for money: 9/10 (10/10

title: I keep going back!
desc: I have been going back to Yotel and I am never disappointed! Thank you for making my stay always a good one. In fact I have proudly told my family and friends to stay at YOTEL, Orchard. So accessible and smartly designed and no bathtub! So its elderly friendly even with wheelchair!

title: OK
desc: Overall very satisfactory particularly with good location, cleanliness and satisfactory breakfast and lunch at the hotel. hope you will keep it up with the coming increasing crowds of tourists and visitors to Singapore

title: Amazing Stay
desc: Firstly, check-in was seamless with the service of the hotel crew. The hotel and lobby feels modern and clean. Location is right by Orchard Road, very convenient location to get around in the city. Amazing view for the First Class Queen. Clean and beautiful rooms. Highly recommended

title: Good location
desc: 24 hrs reception, it is very helpful for tourists to do late check in. There is 24 hrs McDonald , 7-11 and shopping mall near the hotel. Orchard MRT station is connected with ION Orchard mall, only 8 mins by walk from hotel. Very good location.

title: Great location - average hotel
desc: Location is brilliant however the rooms are very small (even for a solo traveller). Vegan options for breakfast are very limited (fruit, bread, noodles, veg), and not good value. Considering that most of the coffee shops open at 10am or later I would recommend stocking up on breakfast food that can be prepared in the room. A fridge and kettle are available.

title: High tech hotel
desc: The hotel seems like a high tech place, with robots delivering water to your front door. Which I want to try it out but never get it to deliver, probably was too busy or something. Great view for the room we‚Äôre staying but it a bit tight for my family. The staff are very friendly and good location for easy access to public transportation.

title: nice little hotel in the middle of orchard shopping street
desc: my second time there, the hotel is right in the middle of orchard, easy to get around, the room is very small but has everything you need, the bathroom is too revealing with glass wall, not good if you have to stay with colleagues, the bed is too soft and some part of the mattress was not in good condition. TV and wifi was good. might stay there again next time if the price goes down a bit.

title: Cool hotel for solo traveller
desc: The hotel itself is nice. The room is clean and they provide room service everyday, just alright for 1 or 2 guest, it's near to the bus and MRT station. There's also heaps of shops and available grab nearby, the breakfast buffet was also quite nice. Overall, enjoyed my stay and would go back again.

title: Amazing Location and Stay
desc: Highly recommend as it is in perfect location, close to shops and metro. Breakfast was good quality and variety. We did not encounter many employees as we did self check in and out which is very efficient. Robots are a good touch.

title: Cleanliness needs more effort. Staff are excellent, polite and helpful.
desc: Staff are helpful, polite and excellent. Only few minutes for checking in. When entering room, sounds great as before. But finally found cleanliness needs much more effort: hairs everywhere on the floor and bed, dirty marks on pillow, urine left around the toilet. But still, staff services are great! If cleanliness can be better, Yotel is still a good choice.

title: good location, worst beds
desc: The bed was sagging already. If you won't stay in the middle, you would fall off it easily. We stayed in rooms 1624 and 1622. I was told that the beds on the 16th floor are yet to be replaced, unlike those on the higher floors. Worst hotel bed ever. No exaggeration.

title: Great location, compact rooms.
desc: The location of the hotel is amazing, the service is good and the high tech is fascinating. However the bunk beds are not a good idea for a family with small children and the main bed was too soft to be of any comfort. The breakfast was outstanding.

title: Great hotel at Orchard
desc: Great hotel in orchard area, small room but super clean, the downside is only no privacy in the bathroom. Location superb with MRT nearby, easy access to anywhere of Singapore. The bed quality is top, I had great sleep nights.

title: Still wonderful as ever
desc: Have stayed at this twice hotel for the past few years. Booked this hotel for movie night and staycation. Check-in was easy using their self-service kiosks. The stay was as wonderful as before. Will visit again if the price is right.

title: Yotel is a excellent Hotel
desc: Yotel in Singapore is a very reasonable price hotel in the best tourist area of Singapore: Orchard Road. The hotel is modern, clean, friendly, and efficient. The rooms are very well designed for the space. You will have to accept a smaller room than the expensive hotels. The restaurant, pool and gym are very good. Overall, an excellent place to enjoy Singapore.

title: Excellent
desc: Very modern and hi-tech hotel. Good location with reasonable price in the Orchard road and many restaurant being around. In the other hand, the room size is very small. Breakfast food taste and choice is not much well, but the service is acceptable.

title: Comfy, clean, convenient hotel with a cool theme and friendly staff!
desc: Cleanliness: excellent Comfort: excellent despite the small space (comfy beddings) Convenience: right on Orchard road, near many famous shopping malls, restaurants and MRT station. Cool theme: space theme with robots delivering water and other amenities. Our 12yr old son really thought this place was cool and comfy. Staff: super friendly and helpful. Will definitely return to YOTEL Singapore!

title: Perfect location and friendly staff
desc: Perfect location to reach subway station to go to any sight-seeing places and for shopping. Quite modern hotel like self-check-in/out, but staffs are very friendly to help. Room is very clean and functional.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Strategic location, very accessible to MRT and very near to 2 bus stop at orchard road. Friendly and helpful staff. Room is clean. Space is well utilized to make the room comfortable. Check in and check out is easy.

title: Another GREAT stay
desc: Stayed at Yotel Singapore several times in the past and always enjoyed it. Room is small and a good fit for 2 people. Highly recommend to get a room with a window (City View). Great location, in the middle of orchard shopping district and less than 5 minutes walk to Orchard MRT station.

title: My stay
desc: Before I arrived at the hotel, I settled the payment on an online platform. Yet, when I checked in, it showed the amount I needed to pay. Luckily, I prepared the transaction record and I didn't need to pay for it. When sleeping, the air conditioner sound was so annoying that I couldn't sleep at night. After checking for two times, one of the staff identified the problem. My room was changed and the arrangement was ok. Yet, on the last day of my stay, there was a cockroach walking around. I was so disappointed.

title: Great value for money!
desc: Loved this hotel! Very efficient, very clean, great location. Rooms are small but well equipped. The bed is very good, no noise, the view is amazing. Bathroom is efficient and clean. Haven't used the restaurant, enough restaurants around. The gym is basically equipped and ok. The pool is great on the 10th floor.

title: Family Holiday
desc: Great location on Orchard Road. Next to all the expensive shops if you like that, close to the souvenir shops too. Best side of town. Ensure you take plenty of water and sunscreen as Singapore is very warm and humid. Don't forget your hat.

title: Good Service and value for money!
desc: I will definitely come back again with my girlfriend. The service was great and location is convenient for leisure and entertainment. The TV channels is better than other hotels and hot shower is great!

title: Super spot
desc: Situated in a really good area on Orchard Road, easy to access. Self check in and check out are very easy. Clean rooms, good breakfast, nice friendly staff. There is a nice restaurant and bar too. Overall a very pleasant stay, highly recommend it.

title: Experiences in the Yotel Hotel
desc: I was surprised on walking in to counter to be told that I have to check in via a computer screen. However, the process was explained to me by a member of the team and it was very easy. All the staff were really happy to help and went out of their way to oblige, especially Sarah on the front desk and M Matthew in the cafeteria. Well done Yotel, you are not the ordinary Hotel.

title: Overall amazing experience at YOTEL makes me a loyal customer!
desc: Perfect stay in a central location, easy access to practically everything! I loved everything about my stay. I am a returning YOTEL customer and will continue to come back / recommend to others. I also cannot get over how comfortable the bed is. No complaints.

title: Excellent stay at Yotel Singapore
desc: Excellent location - right on the Orchard Road - minutes walk from MRT, Bus. The Rooms are tiny, but well stocked. We had a triple room with a view and it accommodated 3 pieces of luggage pretty OK. The beds were really comfy, and had all the amenities a normal hotel would have. The view from bathroom was fantastic! We, unfortunately, didn't get serviced by robots, but they looked cool. Breakfast spread was generous - had vegetarian options too. We were quite pleased with our stay at Yotel and it was such a cool property! Things that could be improved - the hotel entrance is a bit hard to find at first. So, if you can improve signages along the road / MRT. Peculiar thing that I wanted for the Breakfast was - little bit of hot milk for my Milk Tea. But the machine would only

title: All you need for a trip to Singapore
desc: Great location with easy access to Orchard Road and public transport. Efficient check in-check out. clean and bright rooms with well laid out luggage and hanging facilities, bathroom and motorised bed. solid wifi reception, helpful a nd experienced staff at all times.

title: generally okay
desc: it could have been better if there were staff available in the front desk 24/7. or if there were staff and they were unable to receive the call that time, a call back to the cabin should be done. overall, stay was okay.

title: Great Stay
desc: Rooms super modern, great for 1 person, maybe a bit tight for 2 people. Great, modern facility with lots of gimmicks. Quiet hotel despite many rooms. Fantastic breakfast. I found the changing daily prices unfair as I had booked for several days. otherwise everything was fine. would come again.

title: Great location
desc: Indonesians must be so happy to stay here because in front of the building there‚Äôs a smoking dedicated spot. But the pillows - very big, not soft at all. But overall I recommend you guys to stay here.

title: Love our stay here!
desc: Good value for the money! Room and services are really good. Location of Yotel Orchard is perfect too! Would definitely stay here and recommend this place to my friends too! The robots are so cool too!

title: Excellent location, great service
desc: Yotel on Orchard Road ticks all the boxes - perfect location, efficient and courteous service, comfortable stay, reasonable price. Both check in and out are incredibly easy and quick, the reception staff were super helpful.

title: Mart
desc: üëç good value, got to experience to stay at Yotel at least once, close to orchard shopping, bus stop is two minutes walk. Bed is comfortable and can be adjusted for lumbar support, overall room might be compact

title: Very good hotel
desc: It‚Äôs a nice and Very good clean hotel and not far to walk at the mall‚Äôs . The hotel has 2 robots which can bring food at your room.you can take the grab taxi at the front of the hotel. At the 10 th floor you eat drink and swim

title: A nice stay at Yotel
desc: Its a nice stay. We stay in Triple room. The bed is very comfortable, the pillows are also very soft and thick. The type of pillow that I like. Thank you Yotel for our comfortable and clean stay. I will definitely come back to stay at Yotel if i go to Singapore again.

title: My stay in Yotel Orchard
desc: I found it relaxing and the staffs are excellent. Highly recommended. The bathroom is super clean. Comfortable bed but room is a little bit small. But overall we found our stay relaxing and the location is nice.

title: First visit
desc: Good and interesting. This is the first time I am booking for an overseas guest. The choice of colour is interesting but not over bearing. Location is actually very good despite being "hidden" behind another building. Overall I am quote impressed and plan to book it for my friends from overseas should they visit.

title: First Solo Stay
desc: This is the second time check into the hotel. My request for high floor been granted. Plus the mattress is comfortable The breakfast is what i look forwards everyday Location is indeed convenient with buses and mrt

title: Excellent hotel
desc: this hotel is excellent in all aspects of service, i just want to tell that can you not have as pricy foods, so that when you check in you don't need to buy foods outside, its practical for the traveler.

title: Happy Labor Day
desc: Nice Staycation Experience. Staff, buffet, room, cleanliness and location are all good. Best service i have encountered so far. Additional bonus for a futuristic experience with robot service, smart bed and amazing toilet view set-up. Thanks for making a difference.

title: Luxury YMCA I will not recommand it
desc: Beautiful on website however not coumfortable at all. Looks like luxury YMCA not an hotel. If you are travelling for business and you need good sleep it is really not recommandable, matrice are too small and room space too tight.

title: Strategic Location and Clean
desc: Strategic location, near orchard road, MRT, bus station, and foodcourt. The room is clean and well maintained. The staff also very welcome to guest and help us to check in with the self check in machine

title: Great time in Singapore
desc: Arriving early morning after a 14 hour flight with no sleep was tough - then found couldn't get into room until 3. Suggest if you have same situation you pay the extra night. Going round Singapore in English spring clothes having not slept for 40 hours was very tough. But then the room - tiny but turned out to be fine. And the huge plus - such lovely staff. They'll do anything for you and the restaurant and bar are just great. So all in all 4 stars and close to mart (tube) so but tourist card and have fun. Singapore is just fantastic.
