title: Excellent stay and excellent location
desc: the quality of hotel is excellent. the location also very strategic and easy to reach various public transportation and surrounded by many shopping centers. further the price is right for me, and makes this hotel has a good value.

title: very good choice
desc: The Hotel is located in the middel of Orchard and next to the royal thai embassy, so from there you can literally go everywhere. buses or subway, you name it. The station can be a bit tricky so, but you can just ask the staff. The breafast was good, i would say 5/5. I did not eat everyday there so, but i could see some small changes everyday. Gym is small but have everything you need and the pool is absoloutely enough to swim some rounds. Clean of course too. The staff is well trained and the manager there is very good. He overviews everything and you could see that he is very enthusiastic and eager to please the hotel guests. The lobby i felt was always kinda crowded, and i noticed there is not really much space to sit. On one couch water was droping out of the aircondition.

title: The perfect hotel for quick business and leisure travelers
desc: Great location, efficient automated check-in and out, very clean, vibrant and well-lit, quite modern, helpful and knowledgeable staff, robot assistant is a very cool feature to have, and a superb hotel overall!

title: Great hotel at all
desc: You better choose this hotel for sure, nice, clean, perfect location to access and friendly and helpful crews. The bed is so super comfort and good design. I would recommend this hotel is so nice, and cool, suitable for everyone. !!

title: Modern & clean room with a great view of the city
desc: Service was excellent. The room was clean and I love the full length glass at the bathroom. No issue with having to draw the blind before showering. The room is very small but given that I was there for one night for business, it did not bother me. Other business travellers should note that there was no desk to do work. I was working on the bed with my laptop.

title: Good for shopping
desc: Modern and well located, friendly and helpful staff. The hotel definitely will appeal to the young with its robots, internet check-in and out. It has a rather bland minimalist bar restaurant, although keep an eye out for the promotions.

title: Staying in Yotel Orchard Singapore is a great choice! The location is great, just few walks from the MRT station.
desc: Location is great. The room is so clean. Toiletries are complete! We love the rainforest shower. The staff are so helpful, courteous and nice. Will definitely stay here again when we get back to Singapore!

title: Great location, Poor customer service
desc: To be honest, Customer Service could be a lot better in this value. I didn't ask for something much even so much below the average. I need to get a water bottle in 12 pm and i call down from my room to the Mission control and the Cabin Crew multiple times ( around 5-6 times). AND NO ONE ANSWER THE PHONE. This is not an important case i know, but if in the middle of emergency condition, I don't think people could rely on any of the hotel service to get help in time. The main reason people choose 4-5 star hotel more than other choice because they want to be safe and convenient . This is not convenient or safe to me.

title: Very good for Singapore
desc: As we know to find a fair pricesed hotel in Singapore can be challenging. This hotel does give a fair deal. Location is amazing. Just few minutes from Orchard Mrt and just few stops away from main Singapore attractions

title: Good stay to experience in the city
desc: Checked in for a second stay after 2 years (complimentary stay by the GM). Breakfast was good and delicious with local / western spread and their f&b staff were all friend and helpful. Special mention on their custard Egg Bao and Nasi Lemak. Room was good for 2 with a unique adjustable bed. Small space but serves its purpose for a quick stay. Staffs handling for housekeeping and Front desk could be better.. did not experience the robot for this stay but the first stay was delightful when the robot came unannounced. My travel partner enjoyed the view from the bathroom :)

title: Yotel room
desc: Overall is good except the room does not have a table & chair for work. Did not aware of such setup until i checked into the room. The bed is too high especially for short people.. not easy to climb up to the bed.

title: Good
desc: Great location, somewhat small but clean room, friendly staff. Close to major malls on Orchard road so great for shopping. Rooms do not provide some basic toiletries like combs and shower caps though. Overall very nice stay, no complaints.

title: Do not check out early without giving them one day advance notice.
desc: I was charged for an extra day because I did not give one day advance notice of leaving, even though one can cancel their reservation until 3PM day of arrival. I even asked when I checked in if I left early if there would be an issue and was told I would only be charged for the days I stayed. No mention when I asked that I would have to give advance notice.

title: Great cute hotel
desc: The Queen premium hotel room is small, but has everything and with nice cute purple colors. The premium room has a nice smart bed and balcony has a nice city view! The pool looks fine too. I tried calling the customer service several times late night, but unfortunately no one answer, I thought it 24 hours service. Also, would be great if the girl who helped me check-in when I arrived at the hotel have some smiles and enthusiasm. This is very important first impression for any hotel. Overall the Hotel is still nice and I may go again, because the location is perfect located in CBD and the cost I paid for may only can get a basic standard room in other 5 stars hotel with no Balcony around the orchard road area.

title: Modern yet cool HOTEL
desc: Overall excellent and near shopping malls. Clean and easy to check in. Easy to connect MRT and most important the team super friendly. Facility well equipped and definitely good hotel for business and family.

title: Yotel Singapore review
desc: The hotel location was good, near several department stores and brand name shops. The check-in and check-out process were easy and fast. The room was just right for 1 person, but too small for 2 or more people.

title: Yotel is great !
desc: All staff give a very good Service , Cleanliness of room is very tidy, Value of price is very good, Location of Yotel Singapore easy to acces, Comfortable bed give us very good Sleep Quality, and Facility of Room is very complete.

title: Excellent Value for money, good, clean hotel with excellent staff
desc: Hotel rooms were small and difficult to move around. Very limited space for baggage, and some had to be stored under the bed. Bathroom facilities were wanting. AC was automated by a movement sensor which appeared to switch off at night whilst we were asleep.

title: Comfortable stay
desc: There were some minor issues, but overall it was good. One of minor issue was that the room key did not work and I had to visit the front desk twice. The bed was comfortable. It would have been nice if the room was a little larger.

title: I recommend it to everybody
desc: I love the room , everything was clean , I will soon come back with my team to visit again beautiful hotel, and the location is close to mrt that you can go everywhere you want to visit in Singapore. It worth the price I paid for!!

title: Highly recommended
desc: Very commendable staff. Convenient location, and price is just right. Very fast and efficient check-in and check-out. Clean and functional rooms. Everyday housekeeping and has facilities that also work for different lifestyle. Looking forward to our next stay here again hopefully after 3 or 6 months.

title: Good location, clean, nice smell, friendly staff
desc: Good location, 3 mins walk to MRT, surrounded by shopping mall, coffee shop, food court and convenient stores. But not too crowded. The tripple room was a bit small but overall everything was good, clean. I really like the nice smell of the hotel lobby. Plus for smoker : the smoking area was just across the street.

title: Minimalist hotel on the heart of orchard
desc: The location was good, it's walking distance from the orchard MRT. You can go to the Ion orchard and Lucky Plaza by walk. Room: modern minimalist, the room quite spacious with the adjustable bed, still good lah for singapore hotel. Check in or check out the process really fast. The point is they provide additional complent mineral water for the guest. I recommend this hotel if you want to stay in singapore

title: Very Great Hotel & Locations
desc: i stayed in Yotel Orchard. Locations, cleanliness, service, and everything was perfect. Surely will recommend this hotel to my friends, and families. Happy to stay with Yotel. Thankyou for your service

title: smart choice
desc: We stayed in this hotel for 5 nights and chose their premium triple room with bunkbed. Check-in and check-out was a breeze with their self service counter. The staff at mission control (reception) were accommodating and helpful when i had concerns with check in. They have a currency converter machine in the lobby which is convenient if you just need a few bills before heading out. I find the room just the right size for us, a family of 3 with 2 adults and 1 young kid. It had all the basic essentials, practical and functional. The main bed and bunkbed were very comfortable. I especially liked the reclining feature of the main bed. I was very satisfied with housekeeping since the room was cleaned daily and everything was always in order throughout our stay. I forgot to ask the

title: Happy at Yotel
desc: I and my family very happy stay at Yotel for 3nights.. thanks for helpful and hospitaly. The staff very helpfully.. kids also happy when robots come to our rooms to sending some biscuit and tea.. hahaha..

title: Just as expected
desc: Nothing too fancy, small size room but has a swimming pool and strategic location, price is a bit too expensive but perhaps it is within normal market price. Staff were helpful by providing connecting room as requested.

title: Amazing
desc: Loved the concept of the place it was so clean,it had a very relaxing atmosphere. We had so much available to us. Swimming in the pool with the views and the garden was amazing,at night time when the lights came on it was breathtaking

title: Smart Hotel
desc: This is the smart hotel I ever stay. Near Orchard MRT, easy direction from MRT Station. The hotel so clean. They support for the green earth. The price is ok. They give bottle water and free for additional.

title: Basic hotel
desc: Good location. CBD, Close to all shopping malls and restaurants. Difficult to get taxi outside of the hotel because of hotel main entrance is hiding from main road. Basically, no late check out is granted.

title: Location Unmatched. Read Reviews.
desc: Number 1 Tip is to read reviews, like this one. Location is unmatched - quiet, bus stop on the hotel door step, 2 minutes walk to the MRT, 5 minute max wait for a Grab or Go-Jek, multiple food options within minutes and right on THE shopping street of Singapore (souvenirs shopping all the way to luxury brand shopping). Can't speak higher of where it is located. Another plus was the walk back to the hotel wasn't in the dark or down a quiet alley - very safe location. Rooms - small which we expected and other reviews often complained about this, but read the reviews! We believe you will pay for the location and service rather than the room. That being said we stayed in the First Class King room for a little extra space - level 30, the hotel has 6 elevators which we never

title: Yotel Experience
desc: This hotel is very nice & affordable considering its location. The bed is also very comfy. They clean the rooms everyday & change the towels. It was a very pleasant stay. Will definitely book again when I go back to Singapore.

title: Short Trip
desc: Small and compact room at convenient location. Modern styling that comes with robot service. Self checkin and checking out is a truly easy way. Walking distance to major shopping area and transportation.

title: Well located new hotel
desc: Hotel is new and modern in both design and procedure. Rooms are small but the space is well used and comfortable. Bathrooms are spacious with floor to ceiling windows with a great view. Hotel has the facilities you need and robots to bring supplies to your room

title: Nice and decent hotel in Orchard
desc: Nice and decent hotel in Orchard Road. There's a direct bus from the bus stop right outside of the hotel to go to changi airport. (Bus 36 / Bus 36T). Ion Ochard, Tangs, and Shaw Tower are just few minutes walk away. Also, the MRT is located nearby, less than 5 minutes walk away. Thank you for hosting us, Yotel!

title: Great location
desc: We stayed for 3 nights, the hotel has an amazing location, very close to public transports. The breakfast was AMAZING. The staff very helpful. Very clean. The only downside the room was very small and crowded.

title: A centrally located Cabin hotel
desc: The property is somewhat confusingly stated to be in Orchard Road. It isn't. You access it from Claymore Hill behind the Shaw Centre. It is very clean and efficient. Beds are electrically operated to move from a recliner type down to a flat bed or any position in between. Excellent shower and toilet in a spacious bathroom - warning: the windows are normal two way glass so you DO have to close either the the semi-transparent blind or the normal blind before using the facilities. Location is great - it's a short walk downstairs to Orchard Rd and not far from Orchard MRT - use the underground shopping mall access if you wish to avoid the heat outside. I have not tried the restaurant/bar in the hotel, so cannot comment on that aspect - but overall good and spotlessly clean - very

title: Excellent stay in the heart of Orchard Road
desc: Amazing hotel that is very clean and modern looking. The rooms are small but really that's all you need when you are travelling and exploring a city. Bed is very comfortable with lovely linen. Excellent Bar on level 10 with great service and bar range. Very easy check in and check out experience.

title: Great location
desc: if you are alone, then the hotel is very nice, but it can be crowded together. Breakfasts are more focused on guests from Asia. The staff is very, very friendly, respond to requests instantly. Thank you for a wonderful time.

title: Yotel Hotel experience
desc: Hotel location is great close to mall and restaurants. Rooms are little too smail for 3 persons. Bathroom need to improve. Rooms will be nice if it was a little larger especially for 3 persons. It was already cram for 2 persons.

title: Orchard Road Gem
desc: Yotel is at the heart of Orchard, very near Kinokuniya bookstore and ION Orchard Mall. Nearby restaurants either close at 3AM or is a 24-hour one, next to a convenience store like Guardian and provides a rain-free link to all malls using the Shaw Street EXIT. Accessible & affordable and the facilities are 1st Class.

title: well deserved rating
desc: superb overall hotel experience in my long weekend stay the location service are amazing . will definitely recommend to friends or i will chose the hotel in our next singapore trip. it was the perfect hotel in the orchard area

title: Exceptional location, clean, efficient and value for money!
desc: Yotel is situated in the heart of Singapore and easily within walking distance of many major shopping areas, hotels and restaurants. The rooms have been designed in a highly efficient way and nothing is lacking. The value for money for all of this is amasing for a city like Singapore which has gotten more and more expensive.

title: New favorite Singapore hotel
desc: Perfect in all categories from checkin to sleeping like a rock in an amazing bed to leaving my bag for 4-5 hours to your staff arranging a taxi to airport for me! My new go-to hotel in Singapore! Can‚Äôt wait to return.

title: Perfect
desc: I highly recommend staying at this hotel. Finding the hotel and checking in was easy. The staff service was astounding and the facilities were amazing. The rooms were phenomenal. For the price, I would definitely come back.

title: Happiness during the stayed in the hotel.
desc: It the first time to stayed at this hotel we have found in best location, near to all big malls and at easy transportations, we have found the staffs of the hotel helpful in all kinds of needed from them.

title: Awesome Hotel
desc: Great location, within minutes to walk to Orchard MRT. Just behind Shaw Centre on Orchard Road. Bus stop is also just a stroll down the hotel. Friendly staff. New, clean and nice room. Very happy with everything

title: YOTEL
desc: the room is very small but it got everything i need. also the room is so clean and i love the smart bed and what i really really love about the room is the toilet view. first time experience shower with the city view

title: High standard hotel
desc: High standard hotel, looking very cool with modern technology but the room is small in size and hand basin is located next to bed. Its should be located in the wet area. Very small space for open second luggage .

title: YOTEL review
desc: Good hotel to consider if you're looking for a cheaper option while you're in Singapore. Good location too as it's located in the hubub of Orchard! Would definitely recommend for people who likes to travel light to try out Yotel just for the price, good overall service and cleanliness. The hotel lobby always smells nice too!

title: Anna K
desc: Great place to stay. Easy to get to from the airport and taxis are a reasonable price. Lots of shopping centres nearby and designer boutiques. Close to Little India and China Town approx $7 - 8 in a taxi. Beware most restraunts close at 10pm.The pool is a perfect temperature. We had a great time!

title: Good place to stay
desc: Great location and friendly service. You can find market and food court next to the hotel and easy to access public transportation as well. It's lucky for us to have an early check-in without extra fee. The room is a bit small but cozy and clean. Will defo choose Yotel again next time to SG.

title: Excellent Restaurant, Small Room but Perfect Location!
desc: I barely rated restaurants, but the 3 times I ate my dinner/lunch at the 10th floor restaurant, the food was amazing and I was so satisfied! The room is very very small, but the location is perfect. I walked out and it's the shopping heaven in Orchard!

title: YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road
desc: We had an excellent experience with YOTEL. From check in to check out, the staff were very nice and accommodating. They clean the room, replenish the complimentary bottled water, and replace the towels daily.

title: Quiet, convenient and price is fit for my purpose.
desc: The location is very good for going out anywhere for shopping, eating out and sightseeing in Singapore by public bus, MRT so on. The room is quiet and comfortable with no noise of air conditioner. But I want any small chair for relax so on.

title: Vacation
desc: Very nice hotel, close to orchard road, hi tech hotel. The receptionist very helpfull and offer me to order taxi when i want to check out. Check in very fast, and the robot is soo cute. Thank you for your hospitality yotel

title: service
desc: I love the service especially from the staff and your robot. when I requested for more drinking water, the robot came to my room . I really appreciate it and also the ice machine without any charge. I will come back again!

title: Nice to stay good location
desc: Very good location but a bit small room for the price, after all good accomodation with all the facilities, can be better on fixing the tv reception because its keep flip out and off so not good when watching

title: Beyond expectation in Singapore trip!!!
desc: Location, cleanliness, service and sleep quality are excellent. Highly recommend for the stay in downtown Singapore. Next to bus stop, Isetan mall, Thai embassy. Very close to MRT station, many shops, 24 hour food&drink.

title: Great stay!!!
desc: Came with my friends for a weekend in July! The staff was very friendly and extremely helpful! The rooms were nice and clean. I will definitely be staying again with friends as well as family, I highly recommend staying here.

title: Yotel Singapore
desc: it's very good location, right in shopping center - team is rather friendly - the room is very clean. just the room is pretty small. for business trip is ok for me but for Family, a bit small. i like this place

title: Great Ambiance

title: Affordable at excellent location.

title: Short Stay

title: Great value and location
desc: Great location, condition and price. Small but clean and high quality rooms and fittings. Airport bus out front. Food aAnd shopping all around. Really good breakfast. Just the right amount of local and international selections.

title: Smart choice
desc: It is near by the MRT station. The transportation is very convenient. There are also many shopping malls. Yotel has interesting design for its decorations. The breakfast is delicious and varied.The room is clean and comfortable. Smart and worth to choose YOTELüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

title: Modern and Functional hotel

Room is functional and is comfortable for a stay in a busy Country. (For sure we all have a busy itinerary). Staff was extra helpful (even when I checked in at 1:00am) vibe is very nice. I also appreciate the voucher given when we skip cleaning services (8SGD per night *terms and condition) when cleaning is not opted. (I used mine for dinner during my last night) For my next business trip, i will definitely stay at this hotel again.

title: Good and clean hotel
desc: Very good hotel, si clean and so close or near with MRT, only walks in fifteen minutes, we liked stay here, good food at resto, we have good dinner here, with helpfull people, the rate too expensive may be give discount

title: First Time Visit to Singapore
desc: My daughter and I had a girls trip to Singapore. The accommodation was perfect for us. The room was quite small but we didn‚Äôt mind as we weren‚Äôt planning to be in it much apart from sleeping. The room was clean and the staff were friendly, helpful and prompt.

title: Yotel was Fun
desc: Great team and always helpful. They were often in front of the desk assisting. Room small but big in quality and offerings. Location was great . Enjoyed our breakfast and swim in pool. Lived up to expectations with a few cool extras.

title: CEO
desc: It a good hotel, clean, convenient for shopping, traveling. I‚Äôll stay next time. Thank you team helping me with taxi bookings. I will introduce my friends to stay when they have a business trip in Singapore or for traveling is also a good choice. One again I was very happy to stay threr.

Don't bother with in-house breakfast unless it's included - overpriced for the offer and nothing special there. Also note that although they offer a credit in the restaurant if you don't use daily housekeeping, they fail to mention it isn't valid at breakfast - that should be made obvious. Otherwise we had a great stay and I would recommend this hotel

title: Great location to Orchard Road and MRT

title: Good experience
desc: The overall is good in this hotel. Near the MRT station, nice service from hotel staff, fast check in process in self service kiosk, and the clean up service is good. For the resturant, the breakfast quality is good and this is worth to try their own brand craft beer.

title: Tiny and impractical but awesome location and competitively priced
desc: The room was tiny and impractical. The bathroom had nowhere to place your clothes except the floor or toilet seat (ewww!) The location was great, right near Orchard Road not far from the CK Tang building. WIF signal was very strong in the room we were in (near an elevator)

title: Nice location but lots to improve.
desc: Nice location, clean room, and that's all. Fridge wasn't working properly, soundproofing was so poor that I can hear people laughing and talking loud clearly outside the door. The staff were friendly helping calling taxi and the check-in process. Breakfast quality is average.

title: Great for a city trip
desc: Nice hotel for a 2 city trip. The rooms are quite small but with a well thought-out concept that covers all requirements. The view is great. The breakfast is varied and offers a very good price-performance ratio.

title: Good Value For Money
desc: Very and friendly efficient staff. Good location just off Orchard Road. Rooms were clean and well maintained but a bit tight for space, although this was only a very slight inconvenience. Overall, good value for money.

title: My Kid loves Yoshi and Yolanda
desc: My 5-yr old just loved Yoshi and Yolanda`s Service (they are the hotel robots). Location, cleanliness, amenities-superb! Guests are provided with water, which is an essential when in SG. The space is just right for 2 pax. The location is in the heart of Orchard. The mission control team always looks after the need of every client, very pro-active! Keep up the good work!

title: My opinion

title: Consistently good
desc: Always stay at Orchard Road Yotel during my visits to Singapore. The rooms are consistently good in look and feel. Makes it more like home away from home.The amenities - TV, jug,switches, shower, bed, etc are exactly the same in each room, during every visit.

title: We really enjoyed during our stay at the hotel.
desc: Traveler coming to Singapore should try to stay at this property. We really enjoyed during our stay. We like their facilities like swimming pool, self chekin process, breakfast, location (bus stop and MRT are at walking distance).

title: Room 3019

title: Experience at yotel

title: Perfect

title: Interesting hotel
desc: An interesting hotel with a great location and attractive because of the presence of robots, but the rooms are very small. It is possible to exchange money with a car in the lobby/possibility of automatic check-in

title: Loved the robots!!
desc: The hotel is about a 25 min drive from the airport and less than 10 min walk to Orchard metro station. Most attractions were within a 20min metro ride away. Many shops and restaurants were also close by. Staff providing assistance at the automated check-in were very helpful. Rooms are nice and clean. Bed was very comfortable! Our premium queen size room was compact to say the least (as per the website pictures). If you like your space or have lots of luggage with you, you may want to consider an alternative hotel with more room space. The breakfast selection was very good. Breakfast staff could have been more welcoming, not many friendly smiles. It was a nice unique experience for a short stay. Our son enjoyed using the robots to get stuff delivered to the room!

title: Awesome, awesome, awesome!!!!!
desc: Loved our stay!!! So many wonderful things to say. Comfy bed, no noise from adjoining rooms, great view, very clean, staff very attentive, easy check in check out, restaurant very professional and best cocktails ever had.I was there to celebrate my birthday they left me a card and cake in my room, I was blown away. Would definitely stay again!!!

title: Excellent location but robot experience was a bit off
desc: It is close to big shopping malls and accessible to at least three bus stops that goes around the city and one metro station (that I know of). Street sounds are also not audible assuring a good night‚Äôs sleep.

title: SG Family vacation
desc: Learned about this hotel in the net reviews and exoerienced it ourselves. Cozy placd to stay, convenient and accessible to everything. Gave us idea to make a small space convenient to live on. Will surelybstay here again.

title: Spot on hotel for single person
desc: Fantastic hotel very clean , very friendly staff, great location to MRT, A little small for two people, ideal for one person. The room servicing was spot on. Very efficient. Robots were fascinating to watch by did not actually use them my self.

title: Great location
desc: I found the room a bit small but overall it was clean, quiet and comfortable. The bed was very comfortable. The location was very good being on Orchard Road and therefore being next to shopping centres, restaurants and the Big Bus drop off point.

title: Expensive and small, but good central location
desc: YOTEL is like an upmarket Premier Inn. The room were extremely snug and expensive for what they were. It was clean and crisp. Location on Orchard Rd is pretty central. Good area if you like shopping. Staff very helpful and friendly. Check in/out was super easy.

title: Good Service and value for money!
desc: As a return customer, the hotel maintain its service quality and location was good for us. I will love to come back again especially for the late checkout extension that they don‚Äôt fail to gave whenever I asked for it!

title: Satisfied guest
desc: A pleasant stay n very convenient location. Considering it is in Orchard Road area, i think the price is quite reasonable.. I find it easy and so convenient to go and forth from shops to hotel even on my own..

title: Comfortable stay with great views
desc: The hotel is in a great location ony few minutes walk to ION shopping mall and Orchad MRT. The room was small (as expected) but did work for us (2 people). The room itself was clean and had all we needed. The view was really nice! We also liked the breakfast. We changed our room for the last night, because of a damp smell in the fist room which didn't go away with aircon and the staff hadled it really professionally and were understanding. Would recommend this hotel if you wanna stay in a location with good access to the MRT. Overall the hotel interiors were quite fun and different. Price was ok to Singapore price level.

title: Comfortable & convenience stay
desc: We stayed on a family trip. Check in was smoothly done, assisted by staff though some automated system was in place. Breakfast the next day was nice, though restaurant super busy, we managed to get a seat. Food was good. Location is very convenience to get all what we need around Orchard area. We will return.

title: Very nice functional hotel in a great location
desc: Great location on Orchard, nicely appointed hotel, with a clean, modern feel. Small, but efficient, crisp and well equipped rooms: everything works really easily and well (good beds, great bathroom, proper lighting, good views, etc.). Some nice facilities (the pool is good, a small 24h gym), and fairly simple but proper breakfast. Nice and helpful staff. If you're looking for a trouble free, functional place to lodge for a few days, this is a pretty good option at a more than reasonable price point

title: Good, clean and centrally located hotel.
desc: A fine, modern hotel with a superb location near Orchard Rd. MRT station. Good value for money; small but clean rooms with a magnificent view (we stayed at 29th floor). Hotel is good for family stays, as the room has an additional bed above the adjustable bed.

title: Excellent Location with competitive Price
desc: The Hotel is location less than 10 mins walk to MRT Orchard Station, and the route to Orchard Station are all covered. The room is clean and tidy, although it is a small room, is is comfortable to accommodate 3 persons

title: Great Location
desc: Rooms were a bit tiny but that was not a big problem. Beds are comfortable. Loved the shower and would stay in this hotel again. If you arrive late and need something to eat, there are a couple of cafes very close by to satisfy your hunger.

title: Good value option for travellers who only need a basic room
desc: This is a good modern hotel with friendly staff situated in a popular location. The rooms are on the smaller side but if you intend to be away from the hotel most of the time then that is not a problem.

title: good value for money
desc: centrally located, clean and comfortable rooms with windows, excellent service (in the reception and the restaurant), very good breakfast, wifi without any issues. I would certainly stay again when in SG

title: YES...BUT...

title: nice view room small
desc: the view with balcony is very nice but no room to hang clothes very clean sheets though, we didn't eat inside the room but on the 3rd night found ants inside the room and on the balcony! we are at the top floor

title: Cheap price, very very tiny rooms and awkward layout

The showers were a winter garden. The glass partition wasn't frosted enough, so other people in the room could almost see the person showering. It was clear enough to be uncomfortable. This meant that when we woke up in the morning, the room was completely

title: excellent
desc: Overall regarding the use of the hotel room, I was very satisfied, because the condition of the room was clean and well maintained. The hotel location is very strategic, easy to find anything you need around the hotel. only first time guests will have a little difficulty finding the location of this hotel.

title: Singapore Stay-good value
desc: Overall easy to get to and comfortable stay, gym and pool are ok. Staff are friendly. Close to shops for shopping, ie ION, Tangs, Paragon, Ann Ngee City, Takismaya and MRT. Close to local food courts, cinema and easy of transport ie MRT to visit other places in Singapore.

title: World class customer service!
desc: Hotel itself was exceptionally clean but the overall positive rating is due to Sunny and her excellent customer service checking in at 3 am in the morning. It goes without saying after 5 weeks of travel and 12 different hotels, this is customer service!

title: Compact, clean, comfortable
desc: Although the rooms are very compact, ours was perfectly clean, the bed very comfortable, and the service excellent. The cabinetry in the room is cleverly designed to maximise space. I would stay again.

title: Enjoyable Stay
desc: I have stayed at Yotel Orchard 3 times with family. 1st time in July 2022, 2nd time in July 2023, and 3rd time in Sep 2023. Thanks a lot for upgrading me to First Class Queen Suite (R3019) during my 3rd stay. It was an amazing experience with great city view as well as spacious bathroom and balcony. My family and I have always love Yotel Orchard because of its super convenient location, cleanliness, and friendly staff. Nearby is Shaw House and ION is just around 7 mins walk from the hotel. Both reception staff and housekeeping staff were helpful. Yoshi and Yolanda were great, too =D Certainly I will choose Yotel for my next trips in Singapore.

title: Quite good
desc: It was quite good. rooms were smaller than anticipated. Food was quite good but nothing you can‚Äôt find outside the hotel. Bed is quite comfortable and you can move it up and down which is quite cool. Overall it‚Äôs worth a shot and it‚Äôs quite affordable!

title: Great experience in Singapore
desc: This hotel is a step into the future. With an automatic and self check-in and checkout, this hotel offers a clean and comfy stay, with a great view for the city! The breakfast has a lot to choose from and the restaurant has delicious food. We really enjoy staying here, and we recommend it!

title: Convenient stay
desc: Travelled with my dad and brother. Yotel was easy to find and location was good. The room and service matches the rate. Relatively clean, not much space for luggage some of the usb ports were not working. There was no twin bed available and the bed was a bit small for two adults. Nonetheless, we did not expect much so it was a decent stay overall.

title: Hip Hotel at Orchard
desc: Centrally located at Orchard Road. Nice and accommodating staff. The bar at the 10th floor was a cool place to hang out in. The room was clean, although, a bit cramped. It was difficult to walk around the room for lack of space. The bathroom glass, although glazed, does not hide the personfrom prying eyes.

title: clean and good location Hotel
desc: This is a great location for people who want experience orchard area, and it's easy to go to every surrounding area using the local transportation. the most important thing, the hotel maintain its cleanliness

title: Location Location Location
desc: It is in the heart of Singapore and right opposite Ion mall! And all malls and facilities at Orchard. Right opposite Orchard MRT too. So you can comfortable use public transport. The rooms are neat and clean. The bathrooms have a view of Singapore. Staff is friendly and courteous - not just the reception but any random staff you meet during your stay. Plus honest. They located my gold chain and locket I had mistakenly left behind in my room.

title: Canadian overnighting in Singapore and exhausted.
desc: Really enjoyed my stay. Hotel is very chic. View from room 3001 was Epic! I‚Äôll be staying there again on my way home. Not too far from the airport. Staff very attentive to assist with getting a taxi. Overall a perfect stay. Next time I‚Äôll do a video review for my YouTube channel! üòä

desc: Even though I had two senior citizens (one in a wheelchair) and 3 suitcases, no one came to help me when I checked in. Also if you have a wheelchair, it is an effort to move around. title: Singapore with the "Slows"

title: üëç

title: Cleanliness
desc: The first impression is cleanliness. The room looks comfortable, bright & clean. Although it is small but for me is good enough. Recommend for individual or a couple for normal room but for family, it is better to upgrade to a bigger room.
